apiKey.description: Trafiklab ResRobot API key for accessing the departure boards service

displayName.description: The name of the departure board as displayed in the UI.

stopId.description: The id for the stop in the ResRobot API. See https://www.trafiklab.se/sv/api/our-apis/resrobot-v21/stop-lookup/ for more information.

products.description: The product type to filter departures by. See https://www.trafiklab.se/sv/api/our-apis/resrobot-v21/common/ for more information.

fetchInterval.description: The interval in seconds to fetch new departures from the ResRobot API. Balance this so that you don't exceed the API rate limits, but also get timely updates.

fetchDuration.description: How many minutes into the future to fetch departures. This is used to limit the number of departures fetched from the ResRobot API.

walkTime.description: The time in seconds to walk to the stop from the current location. This is used to calculate the displayed departure time.

latitude.description: The latitude of the location for which to fetch the weather.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location for which to fetch the weather.

fetchInterval.description: The interval in seconds to fetch new weather data.
